data.title: Food for just delivered moms and breast feeding moms!!
data.meta_description: Hi Everyone,Almost all of us are moms now and worried about even very small things related to our LOs.I am worried if I am eating well to breast feed my LOâ€¦
data.text: Hi Everyone,Almost all of us are moms now and worried about even very small things related to our LOs.I am worried if I am eating well to breast feed my LO and also am I on the way to gain my pre pregnancy shape back??My Lo is 15 days old today, in the hospital for 3 days I ate what they provided.After coming home mu mil gives me milk and breakast like idli/dosa/bread etc...Lunch I eat rice and some guards/beans curry cooked with garlic with, ghee and powders like til or jeera and dhaniya powder. fresh curd's butter milk sometimes as its very hot now a days. and for dinner same kind of curry and wheat rotis. In fruits i am allowed to eat only pomegranite.is this enough??any food suggestions?? what are you gals eating right after delivery. whats more is good for us and as well as our Los??Please share....
